titleStmt.title: The doctrine of non-resistance or passive obedience, no way concerned in the controversies now depending between the Williamites and the Jacobites by a lay gentleman of the communion of the Church of England, by law establish'd.
titleStmt.author: Bohun, Edmund, 1645-1699.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edmund Bohun. Cf. BM.
